Interface ConfigurationDao<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type parameter
    All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<T,String>, SqlDao<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ConfigurationDao<T>
extends SqlDao<T>
    The interface Configuration dao.
